glosses: to calm down, to get used to quiet down on way (dialect, Ankara, Niğde)
to settle down properly (dialect, Niğde, Adana)
to be fixed (dialect, Ankara, Çankırı, Kırşehir, Kayseri, Niğde)

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish دولنمك (“to rest”), Old Anatolian Turkish دولنمك (dölenmek), ultimately Proto-Turkic *töle- (“to rest”). Cognate with Turkish dölek. Çağbayır considers senses third to sixth to be derived from the preceding.
